com.communote.server.core.service

Class CommunoteServiceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.service.CommunoteServiceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener<RestartServiceEvent>

    public class CommunoteServiceManager
extends Object
implements EventListener<RestartServiceEvent>
    Manages all CommunoteService instances.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommunoteServiceManager

        public CommunoteServiceManager()

    • Method Detail

      • getNameOfService

        public String getNameOfService(Class<? extends CommunoteService> serviceClass)
        Returns the name of the registered service that has the provided class. In case there is no registered service instance of that class null is returned. In case there is more than one service instance of the provided class the name of the first matching is returned.
        Parameters:
        serviceClass - the class of the service
        Returns:
        the name of the service or null

      • getObservedEvent

        public Class<RestartServiceEvent> getObservedEvent()
        Defines the types of events about which this listener will be informed.
        Specified by:
        getObservedEvent in interface EventListener<RestartServiceEvent>
        Returns:
        the class of the observed event

      • handle

        public void handle(RestartServiceEvent event)
        Is called by the EventDispatcher when the observed event was fired.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface EventListener<RestartServiceEvent>
        Parameters:
        event - the event that was fired

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning(String serviceName)
        Returns whether the named service is running. If there is no registered service that has the provided name false is returned, otherwise the return value is the value of CommunoteService.isRunning() of the named service.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service whose status is to be returned
        Returns:
        true if the service was started and not stopped in the meanwhile

      • registerService

        public boolean registerService(CommunoteService service)
        Registers the service if it is not yet registered. The service is identified by the name returned by CommunoteService.getName().
        Parameters:
        service - the service to register
        Returns:
        true if the service was registered, false if it was already registered, cannot be registered on this instance or shutdown() had been called

      • registerService

        public boolean registerService(CommunoteService service,
                               boolean start)
        Registers the service if it is not yet registered. The service is identified by the name returned by CommunoteService.getName().
        Parameters:
        service - the service to register
        start - whether to directly start the service after registering
        Returns:
        true if the service was registered, false if it was already registered, cannot be registered on this instance or shutdown() had been called

      • restart

        public void restart(String serviceName)
        Stops a service by name and restarts it afterwards. If the service is not registered nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service to restart

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Stops and unregisters all running services.

      • start

        public void start(String serviceName)
        Starts a service by name. If the service is not registered or is already running nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service to start

      • stop

        public void stop(String serviceName)
        Stops a service by name. If the service is not registered nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service to stop
